about: My expertise in automation and data validation frameworks enables me to deliver scalable solutions and ensure seamless user experiences. Using agile methodologies and advanced tools, I help optimize performance, increase productivity, and reduce risk throughout the development cycle.

experiences.title: Mobile QA Engineer
experiences.description: I work as a Mobile QA Engineer, focusing on ensuring the quality of our mobile applications. I work side by side with the R&D team, testing our apps on iOS and Android to deliver the best possible experience to users.

experiences.title: QA Engineer
experiences.description: Ensure the excellence of the company's products or services. I am responsible for conducting manual and automated tests using Cypress. My tasks include creating test cases, monitoring bugs and analyzing wireframes to ensure product quality.

experiences.title: QA Engineer Jr.
experiences.description: Prevent errors or failures, avoid problems when delivering solutions, automate tests to increase efficiency, create comprehensive test cases, perform manual tests to identify bugs and validate business rules to ensure the correct functioning of the software. Ensure the quality of the final product.

certifications: Alura - Learn Java with Object Orientation Training
Alura - Selenium: automated acceptance tests in Java
Alura - Career QA Training: test processes and automation
Alura - Quality Assurance: test plan and bug management
Alura - Automated testing: TDD with Python
